column1: # The file is broken into the CPU section followed by the GPU section.
# The first two columns of the CPU section must be "cpu mhz" then "sys mb".,,,,,
# The first column of the GPU section must be "gpu".  This triggers the start of the GPU section.,,,,,
# Each subsequent column header in both sections is a dvar name.

column2: each dvar gets the value listed in its column for the row of the system settings that most closely match the current machine
each dvar gets the value listed in its column for the row of the first GPU string to match.
spaces are treated as wildcards that match any sequence of 0 or more non-numeric characters.  You can use * to match 0 or more of any character
column3: or ? to match any single character.
